A

Action - Class in bcu.s17119577.adventure.model
This class models all possible actions that can be created in the game.
Action(String) - Constructor for class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Action
Constructor to create an action with an action and no required items or effects.

ActionTest() - Constructor for class bcu.s17119577.adventure.test.ActionTest
 
addAction(String) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.World
Adds a new action if no action with the same name exists.
addEffect(Effect) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Action
Method to add an effect that will be caused by the action
addItem(Item) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Location
Adds an item to the location on which this method is called
addItem(String, String) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.World
Adds a new item to the game if no item with the same name exists.
addLocation(String, String) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.World
Adds a new location to the game with a given name and description
addNeighbour(String, Location) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Location
Adds a neighbour to this location, linked by the direction.
addRequiredItem(Item) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Action
Adds an item required for the completion of this action.
